断わる: (ことわる) - to refuse/to reject/to dismiss/to turn down/to decline; to inform/to give notice/to tell in advance; to ask leave/to excuse oneself (from)
断を下す: (だんをくだす) - to pass judgment (judgement); to make a decision
断トツ: (ダントツ) - (from 断然 + トップ) far and away the best; the very best; cream of the crop; crème de la crème; decisive lead; commanding lead
断ヤオ: (タンヤオ) - {mahj}  all simples (chi:); winning hand containing no end tiles or honor tiles
断ヤオ九: (タンヤオチュー) - {mahj}  all simples (chi:); winning hand containing no end tiles or honor tiles
断切り: (たちきり) - cutting apart; something that has been cut apart
断切る: (たちきる) - to cut apart (cloth, paper, etc.); (断ち切る, 断切る only) to sever (ties)/to break off (a relationship); (断ち切る, 断切る only) to cut off (an enemy's retreat)/to block (a road, etc.)/to disconnect
断吟: (たんぎん) - (in Japan) 2nd note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. D sharp)
断固反対: (だんこはんたい) - violently disagreeing; strongly opposing; setting one's heart against
断層写真: (だんそうしゃしん) - tomogram; tomograph
断層地震: (だんそうじしん) - dislocation earthquake; fault earthquake
断層山脈: (だんそうさんみゃく) - fault-block mountains
断層崖: (だんそうがい) - fault scarp; fault escarpment
断層帯: (だんそうたい) - fault zone; fault belt
断層海岸: (だんそうかいがん) - fault coast
断層粘土: (だんそうねんど) - fault gouge; fault clay
断層運動: (だんそううんどう) - fault movement; fault motion; faulting
断層面: (だんそうめん) - fault plane; fault surface
断幺九: (タンヤオチュー) - {mahj}  all simples (chi:); winning hand containing no end tiles or honor tiles
断念: (だんねん) - abandoning (hope, plans); giving up
断熱材: (だんねつざい) - heat insulating material
断片: (だんぺん) - fragment; crumb; shred; bits and pieces
断獄: (だんごく) - trying of a crime/conviction; condemnation to death by beheading
断章: (だんしょう) - literary fragment; interpreting (and using) a passage without regard to its context
断章取義: (だんしょうしゅぎ) - (yoji) interpreting (and using) a passage without regard to its context
断筆: (だんぴつ) - ceasing to write; putting down one's pen
断絶: (だんぜつ) - extinction/discontinuation/interruption; severance/rupture; to become extinct/to cease to exist; to sever/to break off/to divide (between two things)
断続平衡説: (だんぞくへいこうせつ) - punctuated equilibrium (theory of evolutionary biology)
断罪: (だんざい) - judgment (of a crime)/conviction/condemnation; beheading/decapitation
断腸の思い: (だんちょうのおもい) - heartbroken thoughts; heartrending grief; overwhelming sorrow
断行: (だんこう) - decisive action; carry out
断裁器: (ダンサイキ) - cutting machine; paper cutter; guillotine
断裁機: (ダンサイキ) - cutting machine; paper cutter; guillotine
断郊競争: (だんこうきょうそう) - cross-country race
断郊競走: (だんこうきょうそう) - cross-country race
断金: (たんぎん) - (in Japan) 2nd note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. D sharp)
断面プロット: (だんめんプロット) - slice plot
断髪式: (だんぱつしき) - {sumo} retirement ceremony of a wrestler where his top-knot is cut
斯う: (こう) - in this way (used for something or someone close to the speaker, including the speaker himself, or for the opinions of the speaker)/thus/such; uh... (interjection used as a verbal pause)
斯うして: (こうして) - thus; in this way
斯う斯う: (こうこう) - so and so; such and such
